schema_version.description: Semantic-like version tag, e.g. v1.0 of v1.2.3

study_id.description: Internal opaque ID for this article

probast.description: PROBAST (Prediction model Risk Of Bias ASsessment Tool) assessment

sample_size_considerations.description: Sample size, EPV, and overfitting assessment

adequate.description: Whether EPV meets recommended threshold (e.g., â‰¥10-20)

optimism.description: Estimated optimism in performance from bootstrap/CV

fairness_assessment.description: Fairness, equity, and subgroup performance assessment

subgroup_var.description: e.g., age, sex, race/ethnicity, socioeconomic status

equalized_odds.description: Max difference in TPR or FPR

events.description: Number of outcome events in derivation cohort (if applicable)

coding.description: e.g., one-hot, ordinal scores, splines, standardization

transformations.description: e.g., log, Box-Cox, restricted cubic spline

coefficients.description: For regression-type models; beta coefficients per predictor

intercept.description: Regression intercept; for Cox, log-baseline hazard not used

baseline_hazard.description: If Cox/Fine-Gray: description or function of baseline hazard/cumulative baseline hazard

variable_importance.description: For ML models; scale and definition per paper

hyperparameters.description: Key hyperparameters as name/value pairs for portability

calibration_method.description: e.g., Platt scaling, isotonic, recalibration slope

presentation.description: e.g., nomogram, score chart, web/mobile calculator

c_statistic.description: Harrell's C voor time-to-event, indien gerapporteerd

calibration_in_the_large.description: Difference between mean predicted and observed risk

LanguageCode.description: BCP 47 language tag supporting language, region, and variants (e.g., 'en-US', 'zh-Hans-CN', 'ar-EG')

doi.description: DOI with comprehensive character support including brackets and extended punctuation

content_hash_sha256.description: SHA-256 hash van bronbestand of platte tekst (64-char hex)

SourceRef.description: Reference to a specific location within a document

anchor.description: Free-text pointer like 'Table 2', 'Fig 1', or sentence quote

raw_text.description: Original text as found in document
